AI Description: Pilon is a software package that automates the improvement of draft assemblies of microbial genomes, using information from multiple sources to correct draft assemblies.
Core Features: Error Correction In Draft Assemblies, Utilizes Multiple Sources Of Information (E.G. Read Mapping, Alignments, & A Reference Genome), Automatic Implementation Of Corrections, Support For Various File Formats Such As Sam/Bam, Vcf, & Fasta
General Tags: Genome Assembly, Genomics, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology
